meanings.definition: The simultaneous execution of multiple programs on a computer system.
meanings.sent1: Multiprogrammings allows many programs to run together on a computer.
meanings.sent2: My computer's multiprogrammings feature lets me work on different tasks simultaneously.
meanings.sent3: When the computer started doing multiprogrammings, it felt like a party of programs!
meanings.sent4: The concept of multiprogrammings is like a busy city with programs running around.
meanings.sent5: I visualized multiprogrammings as a symphony of programs playing together.

meanings.definition: The ability of a computer system to run multiple programs at the same time.
meanings.sent1: With multiprogrammings, a computer can handle many tasks at once.
meanings.sent2: The efficiency of the system increased due to its multiprogrammings capability.
meanings.sent3: The computer's multiprogrammings seemed like a magic trick with programs juggling tasks.
meanings.sent4: In a world of computers, multiprogrammings is like having a multitasking superhero.
meanings.sent5: The seamless operation of multiprogrammings amazed me as programs worked harmoniously.
